verses.roman:
kona kanyā palāila naivedya la-iyā
tāre ḍāki' kahe prabhu sakrodha ha-iyā

synonyms: kona kanyā—some of the girls; palāila—fled; naivedya—the plate of worshipable things; la-iyā—taking away; tāre—unto them; ḍāki'-calling; kahe—says; prabhu—the Lord; sakrodha—angry; ha-iyā—becoming.
translation: When some of the girls fled, the Lord called them in anger and advised them as follows:
